Summary: 10 to 12 Glowing Orange Fireballs in Vertical Formation Sited Near Silver Sands State Park.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Milford
There were no other sightings in Milford on or around September 12th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI let my dog out at 11:11 pm on Sept 11th and immediately saw a large formation of orange glowing fireballs coming from the South West toward the park. I yelled for my room mate and he came out and saw the same formation. They were in two vertical lines and moving more toward us. I told my roommate to get his camera but then the objects began to get duller. By the time he came out they had really faded. He tried to get some pics but nothing really to see at that point. We are both professionals and have never seen or reported anything like this before. You really can't call the police so this seems like the only alternative.
